name: Sheet Pan Lemon Herb Chicken
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)
Mix olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, herbs, salt, and pepper
Toss chicken and potatoes with marinade
Arrange on a sheet pan
Roast for 25 minutes
Add green beans to pan
Roast another 10 minutes until chicken is cooked through
Serve with lemon wedges

name: Teriyaki Salmon with Broccoli
instructions: Mix soy sauce, honey, garlic, ginger, sesame oil, and vinegar
Marinate salmon for 10 minutes
Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)
Place salmon and broccoli on a baking sheet
Brush salmon with marinade
Roast for 12-15 minutes
Garnish with sesame seeds
Serve with rice

name: Slow Cooker Beef Stew
instructions: Coat beef in flour, salt, and pepper
Brown beef in a skillet (optional but recommended)
Add beef to slow cooker
Add all vegetables
Mix broth, tomato paste, garlic, and herbs
Pour over beef and vegetables
Cook on low for 8 hours or high for 4 hours
Remove bay leaves before serving

name: Vegetarian Stuffed Bell Peppers
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)
Cut tops off peppers and remove seeds
Sauté onion and garlic until soft
Mix quinoa, beans, corn, tomatoes, and spices
Stir in half the cheese
Stuff peppers with mixture
Place in baking dish with 1/2 cup water
Cover with foil and bake 30 minutes
Remove foil, top with remaining cheese
Bake 10 more minutes

name: Thai Basil Chicken Stir-Fry
instructions: Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat
Add chicken and cook until browned
Add garlic and chilies, stir-fry 30 seconds
Add bell peppers and onion
Stir-fry 2-3 minutes
Mix soy sauce, fish sauce, and sugar
Pour sauce over chicken and vegetables
Add basil leaves and toss until wilted
Serve immediately with rice

name: Baked Ziti with Italian Sausage
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)
Cook pasta until al dente
Brown sausage in a large skillet
Add marinara sauce to sausage
Mix ricotta, egg, 1 cup mozzarella, and Italian seasoning
Combine pasta with meat sauce
Layer half the pasta in a 9x13 baking dish
Spread ricotta mixture over pasta
Add remaining pasta on top
Top with remaining mozzarella and parmesan
Bake 25-30 minutes until bubbly

name: Honey Garlic Pork Chops
instructions: Season pork chops with salt and pepper
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Sear pork chops 4-5 minutes per side
Remove pork chops and set aside
In same skillet, add garlic and cook 30 seconds
Add honey, soy sauce, vinegar, and red pepper flakes
Simmer until sauce thickens slightly
Return pork chops to skillet and coat with sauce
Cook 2-3 more minutes until done
Serve with vegetables and rice

name: Chicken Fajita Bowls
instructions: Mix cumin, chili powder, paprika, and garlic powder
Toss chicken with spice mix
Heat olive oil in a large skillet
Cook chicken until browned and cooked through
Remove chicken and set aside
In same skillet, sauté peppers and onions until tender
Warm black beans
Divide rice among bowls
Top with chicken, peppers, onions, and beans
Squeeze lime juice over bowls and garnish with cilantro

name: Lemon Garlic Shrimp Pasta
instructions: Cook linguine according to package directions
Heat olive oil in a large skillet
Add shrimp, season with salt and pepper
Cook 2-3 minutes per side until pink
Remove shrimp and set aside
Add butter and garlic to skillet
Cook garlic 1 minute
Add white wine and lemon juice, simmer 3 minutes
Add cooked pasta and toss with sauce
Return shrimp to pan with parsley
Serve with parmesan cheese

name: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
instructions: Mix soy sauce, broth, brown sugar, and cornstarch
Heat vegetable oil in a wok over high heat
Add beef and stir-fry until browned
Remove beef and set aside
Add sesame oil, garlic, and ginger to wok
Cook 30 seconds
Add broccoli and stir-fry 3-4 minutes
Return beef to wok
Pour sauce over and cook until thickened
Serve over rice

name: Greek Chicken Bowls
instructions: Marinate chicken in olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, and oregano
Grill or pan-cook chicken until done
Make tzatziki by mixing yogurt, cucumber, and garlic
Cook rice according to package directions
Divide rice among bowls
Top with chicken, tomatoes, olives, red onion, and feta
Drizzle with tzatziki sauce
Serve with lemon wedges

name: Cajun Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Cook fettuccine according to package directions
Season chicken with cajun seasoning and paprika
Cook chicken in a large skillet until done
Remove chicken and set aside
In same skillet, melt butter
Add garlic and cook 1 minute
Add heavy cream and simmer 5 minutes
Stir in parmesan cheese until melted
Add cooked pasta and toss with sauce
Top with sliced chicken and parsley

name: Vegetarian Chickpea Curry
instructions: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat
Sauté onion until softened
Add garlic and ginger, cook 1 minute
Add curry powder, cumin, and turmeric
Cook spices 30 seconds until fragrant
Add chickpeas, tomatoes, and coconut milk
Simmer 15 minutes
Stir in spinach until wilted
Garnish with cilantro
Serve over rice or with naan

name: BBQ Pulled Pork
instructions: Mix brown sugar, paprika, chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper
Rub spice mixture all over pork shoulder
Place onion and garlic in slow cooker
Place pork on top
Mix BBQ sauce and vinegar, pour over pork
Cook on low for 8 hours or high for 4 hours
Shred pork with two forks
Mix shredded pork with sauce in slow cooker
Serve on buns, over rice, or with vegetables

name: Mediterranean Baked Cod
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)
Place cod fillets in a baking dish
Drizzle with olive oil and wine
Top with tomatoes, olives, capers, and garlic
Season with oregano, salt, and pepper
Squeeze lemon juice over fish
Bake 15-20 minutes until fish flakes easily
Garnish with fresh parsley
Serve with crusty bread or rice

name: Mongolian Beef
instructions: Coat beef strips in cornstarch
Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat
Fry beef in batches until crispy
Remove beef and drain on paper towels
Drain most of the oil, leaving 1 tablespoon
Add garlic and ginger, cook 30 seconds
Add soy sauce, brown sugar, water, and red pepper flakes
Bring to a boil and simmer until thickened
Add beef back to pan and toss with sauce
Garnish with green onions and serve over rice

name: Turkey Meatballs in Marinara
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)
Mix turkey, breadcrumbs, parmesan, eggs, garlic, parsley, and seasonings
Form into 1.5-inch meatballs
Place on a baking sheet
Bake 20 minutes until cooked through
Heat marinara sauce in a large pot
Add meatballs to sauce
Simmer 10 minutes
Serve over pasta or with crusty bread

name: One-Pot Chicken and Rice
instructions: Season chicken with paprika, thyme, salt, and pepper
Heat olive oil in a large pot or Dutch oven
Brown chicken on both sides
Remove chicken and set aside
In same pot, sauté onion and carrots until softened
Add garlic and cook 1 minute
Add rice and stir to coat
Pour in chicken broth and bring to a boil
Place chicken on top of rice
Cover and simmer 25-30 minutes
Add peas in last 5 minutes
Let rest 5 minutes before serving

name: Spicy Sausage and Peppers
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet
Brown sausages on all sides
Remove sausages and slice into 1-inch pieces
In same skillet, sauté peppers and onions
Cook until softened, about 8 minutes
Add garlic and cook 1 minute
Return sausage to skillet
Add tomatoes, red pepper flakes, and Italian seasoning
Simmer 10 minutes
Serve over pasta, rice, or with crusty bread

name: Balsamic Glazed Chicken
instructions: Season chicken with salt and pepper
Heat olive oil in a large skillet
Sear chicken 5-6 minutes per side until golden
Remove chicken and set aside
In same skillet, add garlic and cook 30 seconds
Add balsamic vinegar, honey, mustard, and rosemary
Bring to a boil and simmer 5 minutes until thickened
Return chicken to skillet
Spoon glaze over chicken and cook 2 more minutes
Serve with roasted vegetables
